page.title: 05SHOPPING_TRADE
page.content:
The main area of shops and offices are in one small section of our block and these form the main shopping precinct of{Abertillery.} Here the majority of the people in the block shop for everyday items _these include foodstuffs,clothes,hardware etc..There are two major grocery outlets _Kwiksave and Liptons;as well as a Woolworth store.The other shops tend to be locally owned,with the exception of two motor accessory outlets,which are South Wales based. The town has its own family run bakery and a local fruit and vegetable firm that has two shops in this area.
The offices in the area are the usual mix of local solicitors,dentist, doctor and agents for national building socities and insurance houses.
